text:
Happy Friday All!

I am having trouble finding solution to this issue.

I have created a custom module, and I have some Style Fields, specifically Spacing. My question is, how do accommodate  for desktop and mobile settings in my CSS?

In default modules, you can set a margin on desktop, and a separate one for mobile, using the Styles tab alone. How do I mimic that in custom modules?

Currently - if I set a margin in one breakpoint, it remains the same in the other. No seperation at all.
